Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #the Fire Arrows#.
